description:
A simplistic game which humorously touches subject of  computer addiction and how something as simple as a notification can become our biggest weakness.

The concept and name was inspired by real life article about a guy who died after playing Diablo III for 72 hours straight.

Player takes over a role of unknown AI which is learning habits and hobbies of a certain person and adjusts accordingly to control him and not let him leave his computer at any cost.

This game was created in 45 hours as part of the Bratislava Game Jam 2017 by:

Jakub Hranický

Radko Vitez

Ľubomír Dait
